summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Comstock Street, from 7th Avenue North to 6th Avenue North; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7553 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
